Thanks all, I've exhausted my arguments.  I concede.  Much appreciated 
discussion!

Peter Williams wrote:
> 
> 
> --- In rest-discuss@yahoogroups.com 
> <mailto:rest-discuss%40yahoogroups.com>, Bill Burke <bburke@...> wrote:
>  > Incompatibility with specific popular frameworks is a good reason
> not to
>  > head this way. Incompatibility with a hypothetical framework is not.
> 
> Well if you are looking for specifics, it is definitely not compatible
> with the content negotiation mechanisms of Rails or Merb.
> 
> 

-- 
Bill Burke
JBoss, a division of Red Hat
